article: This economy has really got a lot of people moving and not always by a choice they wanted to make. My wife and I now find ourselves among those unfortunates feeling that _ At the end of last year, our customers just dried up . We had to make the painful decision to _ our office and put our house up for _ . We haven't lived in it for two years yet and expected it would be the _ one for a long time. How _ this world economic mess is changing our lives! As I get older, I find moving less adventurous and more _ . This time, we're in the process of moving without knowing where we'll _ next. Job searching has been thrown into the quagmire of an unsettled life. Both my wife and I had been feeling pretty _ from all this. I've been challenged to find the positive in all this down that's _ us. But then it happened while I watched my wife _ things up. She's an absolute whiz when it comes to packing. I took delight in watching her size up just the right boxes for _ in front of her and filling in the _ with pillows and towels. I began feeling something like a wind lift me up and sail me through my own _ of the packing and loading. Some friends will be helping us with the _ . I've told them that they're not _ friends but gaining some new vacation spots. I have _ that we'll get through this transition finally. We all will always have work to do, by choice or _ , and we can also consciously make the effort to create a sense of _ in a new place.
